name: Pure II
overview: The situation at the high-school soccer club is not good, and the coach is even afraid of getting fired... that's where the hero of the game, a student named Kitayama, steps into the picture. The coach asks him to become a "beauty manager", to search out pretty girls and to convince them participate in club activities. Kitayama is aided by two other schoolmates, but the player has to do the job all by himself... The game plays similarly to its predecessor, with its Japanese adventure-style gameplay, high school setting, and the same menu commands at each location. There are no item-related commands, however, but some new ones, such as "Touch".
